title: Orientation
description: Defines an orientation.  An orientation is a rotation that takes a vector expressed in the "body" axes of the object and transforms it to the Earth fixed axes.

unitQuaternion.description: The orientation specified as a 4-dimensional unit magnitude quaternion, specified as `[X, Y, Z, W]`.

reference.description: The orientation specified as a reference to another property.

velocityReference.description: The orientation specified as the normalized velocity vector of a position property. The reference must be to a `position` property.
